item.title: NPC declaring if player is on help
item.dc:creator: @g27viper g27viper
item.description:
@g27viper wrote:

I spawned a dog npc and placed him where i wanted to, have no errors in compiler, but wont say if if online or offline.
i did this code a while back and he atleast said i was offline. Here’s the code any help??

[code]else if (npcs[i].npcType == 98)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“viper”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Viper is Online!”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Viper is Offline!”;
}

[/code]
